replies.bodyText: Had a dig around and there's no easy fix for this. There's been an issue for most nuance to this rule on the Checkstyle project since 2013, so I don't think it's going to be resolved any time soon. Given the scope of the variables, it's probably better to keep with the checkstyle as generally it's a useful check.
